original_text: Hear ye this, O priests; and hearken, ye house of Israel; and give ye ear, O house of the king; for judgment is toward you, because ye have been a snare on Mizpah, and a net spread upon Tabor.
korean_text: 제사장들아 이를 들으라 이스라엘 족속들아 깨달으라 왕족들아 귀를 기울이라 너희에게 심판이 있나니 너희가 미스바에 대하여 올무가 되며 다볼 위에 친 그물이 됨이라

sentences.original_text: and hearken, ye house of Israel
and give ye ear, O house of king
because ye have been a snare on Mizpah
and a net spread upon Tabor
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다볼에 펼쳐진 그물이 되었기 때문이라
